entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -0.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
